<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Tiller's Aid](/Feats.aspx?ID=933) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Bellflower Tiller](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=23)

**Prerequisites**
[Bellflower Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=928)

</column>

---

You can use the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) reaction to help a member of your crop even if you haven’t prepared to do so.
name: Tiller's Aid
